title: The Murdered Metatron
description: READ ALL OF THE METATRON MYSTERIES by James Glass *The Murdered Metatron *The Dispossessed (Available February 15, 2014)The voice of God is dead.....  When John Smith wakes from a coma in Gettysburg, Pennsylvania he remembers nothing of his past except that he might have tried to commit suicide. In an effort to pay the bills he becomes a private detective and is hired by a strange pair of clients who are determined to find out who killed the Voice of God. The clues lead him to the doorstep of the strange and reclusive Virgil Calahan and a hundred year old crime.
author: James  Glass
